question: This country agreed to commit a bilateral relations with Cambodia to new high and Two countries sign four MoUs recently.
explanation: India and Cambodia signed four Memoranda of Understanding in areas, including deepening cooperation in culture and preventing human trafficking. The MoUs were signed after delegation-level talks between Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his Cambodian counterpart Hun Sen in New Delhi. The two countries are committed to taking their relationship at a newer level. He attended the India-ASEAN Commemorative summit in New Delhi and also attended the Republic Day Parade yesterday along with other ASEAN leaders.
